alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 10:16PM CDT until June 16 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1015 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Antioch, or near Troy, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Midland City, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard, Lee, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Kinston, Napier Field, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald and Camp Humming Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
